blocks.legend: ACME provides a wide range of solutions catering to all stages of the production line.

blocks.name: block-2
blocks.title: Acme offers to Wood and Metalworking industries strong, resistant components that will enhance productivity without any loss of safety.
blocks.text: These sectors require solutions able to handle heavy components with precision in dusty hot environments. Acme solutions are reliable, powerful & withstand pressure and massive weight.
blocks.label: See our products

blocks.name: block-3
blocks.legend: Acme provides manual handling as well as pneumatic automation components.
